text: Ayo Edebiri ( ; born October 3, 1995) is an American actress, comedian, and television writer. She is known for playing chef Sydney Adamu in the comedy- drama series The Bear. For this role, she won a Golden Globe Award, two Screen Actors Guild Awards, and a Primetime Emmy Award. Edebiri has been a writer and voice actor on Big Mouth since 2020. She also voiced Envy in Pixar's Inside Out 2 (2024). Edebiri is a member of the Democratic Socialists of America. She is queer. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television writers Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:Actors from Boston Category:Comedians from Boston Category:Writers from Boston Category:Movie producers from Massachusetts Category:LGBT people from Massachusetts Category:LGBT comedians Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT producers Category:LGBT directors Category:LGBT writers Category:Queer people Category:LGBT African-Americans
